alert.note: Alert for Jasper; Smith (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued April 15 at 1:10PM CDT until April 15 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 PM CDT FOR JASPER...EASTERN SMITH AND NORTHEASTERN JONES COUNTIES... At 110 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Moss, or near Stringer, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Heidelberg around 120 PM CDT. Stafford Springs and Paulding around 125 PM CDT. Orange around 135 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Sylvarena, Montrose and Louin. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
